turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi there. I was I was looking to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great what kind of coffee do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking of a caffè mocha, grande sized.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay sounds good. what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And did you want whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So, that's a grande cafe mocha with whipped cream and whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm seeing a lot of starbucks near you, which one is closest?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay which mall is that? There are 2 nearby.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay great. I've got your order ready and sent to the Starbucks at the Birchwood mall. It'll be ready in 15 minutes.
